member.name: T:NGettext.Catalog
member.summary: Represents a Gettext catalog instance. Loads translations from gettext *.mo files.

member.name: M:NGettext.Catalog.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with no translations and with current CultureInfo.

member.name: M:NGettext.Catalog.#ctor(System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with no translations and with given CultureInfo.
member.param: Culture info

member.name: M:NGettext.Catalog.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with current CultureInfo and loads MO translations from given stream.
member.param: Stream that contain binary data in the MO file format

member.name: M:NGettext.Catalog.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with given CultureInfo and loads MO translations from given stream.
member.param: Stream that contain binary data in the MO file format
Culture info

member.name: M:NGettext.Catalog.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with current CultureInfo and loads translations from MO file that can be found by given parameters.
member.param: Catalog domain name
Directory that contains gettext localization files

member.name: M:NGettext.Catalog.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with given CultureInfo and loads translations from MO file that can be found by given parameters.
member.param: Catalog domain name
Directory that contains gettext localization files
Culture info

member.name: M:NGettext.Catalog.Load(System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Load translations from MO file that can be found by given parameters.
member.param: Culture info
Catalog domain name
Directory that contains gettext localization files

member.name: M:NGettext.Catalog.Load(System.String)
member.summary: Load translations from MO file that can be found by given path.
member.param: Path to *.mo file

member.name: M:NGettext.Catalog.Load(System.IO.Stream,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Load translations from given MO file stream using given encoding.
member.remarks: By default, parser will try to detect file encoding automatically with fallback to UTF-8 encoding. If you specify any encoding in this method, auto-detect will be turned off and given encoding will be used instead.
member.param: Stream that contain binary data in the MO file format
File encoding (auto detect by default)

member.name: T:NGettext.Loaders.BigEndianBinaryReader
member.summary: Reads primitive data types as binary values represented in big endian byte order.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.BigEndianBinaryReader.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the supplied stream and using System.Text.UTF8Encoding.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.BigEndianBinaryReader.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the supplied stream and a specific character encoding.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.BigEndianBinaryReader.ReadInt16
member.summary: Reads a 2-byte signed integer from the current stream and advances the current position of the stream by two bytes.
member.returns: A 2-byte signed integer read from the current stream.
member.exception: The end of the stream is reached.
The stream is closed.
An I/O error occurs.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.BigEndianBinaryReader.ReadUInt16
member.summary: Reads a 2-byte unsigned integer from the current stream using little-endian encoding and advances the position of the stream by two bytes.
member.returns: A 2-byte unsigned integer read from this stream.
member.exception: The end of the stream is reached.
The stream is closed.
An I/O error occurs.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.BigEndianBinaryReader.ReadInt32
member.summary: Reads a 4-byte signed integer from the current stream and advances the current position of the stream by four bytes.
member.returns: A 4-byte signed integer read from the current stream.
member.exception: The end of the stream is reached.
The stream is closed.
An I/O error occurs.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.BigEndianBinaryReader.ReadUInt32
member.summary: Reads a 4-byte unsigned integer from the current stream and advances the position of the stream by four bytes.
member.returns: A 4-byte unsigned integer read from this stream.
member.exception: The end of the stream is reached.
The stream is closed.
An I/O error occurs.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.BigEndianBinaryReader.ReadInt64
member.summary: Reads an 8-byte signed integer from the current stream and advances the current position of the stream by eight bytes.
member.returns: An 8-byte signed integer read from the current stream.
member.exception: The end of the stream is reached.
The stream is closed.
An I/O error occurs.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.BigEndianBinaryReader.ReadUInt64
member.summary: Reads an 8-byte unsigned integer from the current stream and advances the position of the stream by eight bytes.
member.returns: An 8-byte unsigned integer read from this stream.
member.exception: The end of the stream is reached.
An I/O error occurs.
The stream is closed.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.BigEndianBinaryReader.ReadSingle
member.summary: Reads a 4-byte floating point value from the current stream and advances the current position of the stream by four bytes.
member.returns: A 4-byte floating point value read from the current stream.
member.exception: The end of the stream is reached.
The stream is closed.
An I/O error occurs.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.BigEndianBinaryReader.ReadDouble
member.summary: Reads an 8-byte floating point value from the current stream and advances the current position of the stream by eight bytes.
member.returns: An 8-byte floating point value read from the current stream.
member.exception: The end of the stream is reached.
The stream is closed.
An I/O error occurs.

member.name: T:NGettext.Loaders.ReadOnlyStreamWrapper
member.summary: Stream wrapper that prevents closing and writing to underlying stream.

member.name: P:NGettext.Loaders.ReadOnlyStreamWrapper.BaseStream
member.summary: Gets or sets the underlying stream.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.ReadOnlyStreamWrapper.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that wraps specified underlying stream.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.ReadOnlyStreamWrapper.Flush
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, clears all buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.
member.exception: An I/O error occurs.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.ReadOnlyStreamWrapper.Seek(System.Int64,System.IO.SeekOrigin)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, sets the position within the current stream.
member.returns: The new position within the current stream.
member.param: A byte offset relative to the parameter.
A value of type indicating the reference point used to obtain the new position.
member.exception: An I/O error occurs.
The stream does not support seeking, such as if the stream is constructed from a pipe or console output.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.ReadOnlyStreamWrapper.SetLength(System.Int64)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, sets the length of the current stream.
member.param: The desired length of the current stream in bytes.
member.exception: An I/O error occurs.
The stream does not support both writing and seeking, such as if the stream is constructed from a pipe or console output.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.ReadOnlyStreamWrapper.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
member.returns: The total number of bytes read into the buffer. This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.
member.param: An array of bytes. When this method returns, the buffer contains the specified byte array with the values between and ( + - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.
The zero-based byte offset in at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.
The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.
member.exception: The sum of and is larger than the buffer length.
is null.
or is negative.
An I/O error occurs.
The stream does not support reading.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.ReadOnlyStreamWrapper.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, writes a sequence of bytes to the current stream and advances the current position within this stream by the number of bytes written.
member.param: An array of bytes. This method copies bytes from to the current stream.
The zero-based byte offset in at which to begin copying bytes to the current stream.
The number of bytes to be written to the current stream.

member.name: P:NGettext.Loaders.ReadOnlyStreamWrapper.CanRead
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports reading.
member.returns: true if the stream supports reading; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NGettext.Loaders.ReadOnlyStreamWrapper.CanSeek
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports seeking.
member.returns: true if the stream supports seeking; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NGettext.Loaders.ReadOnlyStreamWrapper.CanWrite
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports writing.
member.returns: true if the stream supports writing; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NGettext.Loaders.ReadOnlyStreamWrapper.Length
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the length in bytes of the stream.
member.returns: A long value representing the length of the stream in bytes.
member.exception: A class derived from Stream does not support seeking.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.

member.name: P:NGettext.Loaders.ReadOnlyStreamWrapper.Position
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the position within the current stream.
member.returns: The current position within the stream.
member.exception: An I/O error occurs.
The stream does not support seeking.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.ReadOnlyStreamWrapper.BeginRead(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Begins an asynchronous read operation.
member.returns: An that represents the asynchronous read, which could still be pending.
member.param: The buffer to read the data into.
The byte offset in at which to begin writing data read from the stream.
The maximum number of bytes to read.
An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the read is complete.
A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous read request from other requests.
member.exception: Attempted an asynchronous read past the end of the stream, or a disk error occurs.
One or more of the arguments is invalid.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.
The current Stream implementation does not support the read operation.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.ReadOnlyStreamWrapper.BeginWrite(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Begins an asynchronous write operation.
member.returns: An IAsyncResult that represents the asynchronous write, which could still be pending.
member.param: The buffer to write data from.
The byte offset in from which to begin writing.
The maximum number of bytes to write.
An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the write is complete.
A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous write request from other requests.
member.exception: Attempted an asynchronous write past the end of the stream, or a disk error occurs.
One or more of the arguments is invalid.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.
The current Stream implementation does not support the write operation.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.ReadOnlyStreamWrapper.EndRead(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Waits for the pending asynchronous read to complete.
member.returns: The number of bytes read from the stream, between zero (0) and the number of bytes you requested. Streams return zero (0) only at the end of the stream, otherwise, they should block until at least one byte is available.
member.param: The reference to the pending asynchronous request to finish.
member.exception: is null.
did not originate from a method on the current stream.
The stream is closed or an internal error has occurred.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.ReadOnlyStreamWrapper.EndWrite(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Ends an asynchronous write operation.
member.param: A reference to the outstanding asynchronous I/O request.
member.exception: is null.
did not originate from a method on the current stream.
The stream is closed or an internal error has occurred.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.ReadOnlyStreamWrapper.ReadByte
member.summary: Reads a byte from the stream and advances the position within the stream by one byte, or returns -1 if at the end of the stream.
member.returns: The unsigned byte cast to an Int32, or -1 if at the end of the stream.
member.exception: The stream does not support reading.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.ReadOnlyStreamWrapper.WriteByte(System.Byte)
member.summary: Writes a byte to the current position in the stream and advances the position within the stream by one byte.
member.param: The byte to write to the stream.
member.exception: An I/O error occurs.
The stream does not support writing, or the stream is already closed.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.ReadOnlyStreamWrapper.Close
member.summary: Closes the current stream and releases any resources (such as sockets and file handles) associated with the current stream.

member.name: T:NGettext.Loaders.MoFileParser
member.summary: MO file format parser. See http://www.gnu.org/software/gettext/manual/html_node/MO-Files.html

member.name: F:NGettext.Loaders.MoFileParser.MO_FILE_MAGIC
member.summary: MO file format magic number.

member.name: P:NGettext.Loaders.MoFileParser.Encoding
member.summary: Current encoding for decoding all strings in given MO file.
member.remarks: Default value is UTF-8 as it is compatible with required by specifications us-ascii. This value could be changed when DetectEncoding property is set to True and the MO file contains a valid charset name in the Content-Type header.

member.name: P:NGettext.Loaders.MoFileParser.DetectEncoding
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whenever the parser can detect file encoding using the Content-Type MIME header.

member.name: P:NGettext.Loaders.MoFileParser.IsBigEndian
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whenever loaded file was in the big-endian format.

member.name: P:NGettext.Loaders.MoFileParser.FormatRevision
member.summary: Gets parsed file's format revision.

member.name: P:NGettext.Loaders.MoFileParser.Headers
member.summary: Gets parsed file's metadata.

member.name: P:NGettext.Loaders.MoFileParser.Translations
member.summary: Gets parsed file's translation strings.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.MoFileParser.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:NGettext.Loaders.MoFileParser.Parse(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Parses a GNU MO file from the given stream and loads all available data.
member.param: Stream that contain binary data in the MO file format

member.summary: Creates a plural rule for given culture.
member.remarks: Default furmulas created using information from http://cldr.unicode.org/
